title: Create a Kanban board UI
description: The board should have columns for 'To Do', 'In Progress', and 'Done'.

title: Develop task creation functionality
description: Users should be able to add new tasks to the 'To Do' column.

title: Implement drag-and-drop for tasks
description: Tasks should be movable between columns.

title: Style the application
description: Add CSS to make the Kanban board look good.

title: Setup backend API
description: Create API endpoints to fetch, create, update, and delete tasks.

title: Project planning meeting
description: Discuss the project roadmap and milestones.

title: Initial project setup
description: Setup the git repository and initial file structure.
